A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Huge disappointment\, cringeworthy humor\, constantly annoying creatures on screen who only exist for merchandising. Rey is a total Mary-Sue\, Luke's legacy is completely destroyed\, Finn's subplot is pointless and boring and Leia has superpowers for some reason? Snoke and Rey's powers aren't explained at all\, which proves the writers were improvising and don't have a clue what they are doing.
